Contour plot(s) of a fitted linear model with ggplot2

Source: R/contour_plots.R
contour_plots.Rd

Contour plot(s) of a fitted linear model with ggplot2

contour_plots(rsm_contour, ncol = 2, stroke_size = 0.1, return_list = FALSE)

Arguments

rsm_contour

Contour using an rsm/lm object
ncol

Specify the number of column used in grid layout for contour plots. Default is ncol=2
stroke_size

width of stroke relative to the size of the text. Ignored if less than zero.
return_list

If TRUE, a list of the generated contour plots will be returned. Otherwise, the generated contour plots will be displayed in a grid layout. Default is FALSE

Value

contours plot(s) of a fitted linear model with ggplot2. If return_list is TRUE, then a list of the individual contour plot(s) will be returned

Examples

library(rsm)

#> Warning: package 'rsm' was built under R version 4.0.3
heli = rsm::heli
heli.rsm <- rsm (ave ~ block + SO(x1, x2, x3, x4), data = heli)
rsm_contour <- contour (heli.rsm, ~x1+x2+x3, at = xs(heli.rsm),plot=FALSE)
contour_plots(rsm_contour,ncol=3)
